task.title: How to Use the Harman/Kardon Speakers

context.p: The Harman/Kardon Speakers provided in Shanks 180 and 360 are already plugged into the Mac desktop and will be simple to use!

step.cmd: Turn the volume dial on the right speaker to your desired volume.
Begin playing the music, video, or audio file on the computer.
Adjust the volume more, if needed. Also, you may want to adjust the tone dial if the sound is still not clear.
